CardData.FlavorText: <line-height=100%><size=200%>F</size>ocused as you were upon fleeing the persistent orcs, you realize too late that the poles you found with the raft are ill-suited as paddles. Evidently, whomever made the craft only used it to travel close to shore. Alas, having already forged recklessly i

Localization.Title: Forced Off-course
Localization.Text: Restore every Objective to its full Quest value; then add +2 to each
